name.description: The friendly name of the extension. This is displayed in the Suggested Extensions dialog.

description.default: The description of the extension as specified in their '.vsixmanifest' file.

productId.default: This is the ID of the extension as specified in their '.vsixmanifest' file.

mandatory.description: Mandatory extensions are the ones needed to work on or compile a project in the solution.

optional.description: Optional extensions are not required to work on the solution, but will be helpful for the developer.
